mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `product` WHERE `productId` IN ( SELECT p.`productId` FROM `categoryone` AS co INNER JOIN `categorytwo` AS ct ON co.`categoryOneId` = ct.`categoryOneId` INNER JOIN `categorythree` AS cth ON ct.`categoryTwoId` = cth.`categoryTwoId` INNER JOIN `product` AS p ON p.`categoryThreeId` = cth.`categoryThreeId` INNER JOIN `producttype` AS pt ON p.`productId` = pt.`productId` INNER JOIN `orderitem` AS oi ON pt.`productTypeId` = oi.`productTypeId` WHERE oi.`status` > 1 AND co.`categoryOneId` = #{coId} GROUP BY p.`productId` ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC )LIMIT 0,5
